EmailTemplate.name: Account Owner Notification - Record on Denied Party List
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Owner Notification - Record on Denied Party List
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Attention: Salesforce User
The following SFDC Account has been identified on the Denied Party List.
Account Name: {!Account_Address__c.Account_Name__c}
Denied Party status is determined at the Account Address level. Be sure to view the Account Addresses to determined addresses with which we should not be doing business.
Please click the link below for further details: {!$Label.ServerName}/{!Account_Address__c.Account_NameId__c}
This communication has been extended to you as you have been identified as the "Account Owner" for the record referenced above.
Please follow Export Compliance Policies while engaging business transactions with this customer.
Thanks!
